descriptionHtml:
Updates:
 version 2:
 - added depth of field
 - added ambient occlusion

Description:
This small modification... hmm... combination of other ENB\'s files. i managed to make a nice ENB tweak which makes your gaming experience better with a small hit on performance...  if you feel that the fireplace inside dragonsreach in front of the jarl\'s throne is too bright... this is the mod for you =) 

This is a combination of High Quality ENB files and High Performance ENB files... the basic changes is what i want, but somethings don\'t look right so ill try fixing it... the flash when casting lightning skills looks different in my PC (hurts my eye really) ... i wish that problem is only happening on my PC, but ill try fixing it... =)

Bugs:
none so far...

Installation:
just extract all files to ur skyrim directory (where TESV.exe is located)

Updates:
ill be posting v2 this week... i hope i can fix some problems =D

MY OTHER MODS:
 - ENB Realism Performance TRANSCEND > http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20507
 - ENB Realism Performance CINEMA > http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20545
 - NEW Dance Animation Compilation for FNIS > http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20541

PLEASE ENDORSE =)
PLEASE POST PHOTOS
PLEASE COMMENT
PLEASE POST PROBLEMS =)
author: Darkblader707
